text:
Full-stack consultant for 1 year+ contract for a very large well-known automotive company in the Dallas area.

• Angular or Ember experience • Mobile (iOS swift or ObjC and Android) experience • Java experience • Java Spring or Node • Docker or Kubernetes or Azure experience • MongoDB or Azure Cosmos • Swagger experience a plus

3-5+ years experience Must have experience working in a fast-pace scrum environment

Must work onsite relocation assistance available for the right developers.

Email your resume or questions to patrick {at} lannisterconsulting.com if interested
